values:
hey wazup, 
well its been awhile I have been trying to figure out myspace sence everyone and there mother is on it. So maybe once I get it going i will hit all you uyp with my account so you can keep in touch if you like the little bit i write in here. So I guess I will talk to you later.
Oh yah it's pep assembly day and I am all 2007 out because its all about 2007 and what.
oh well abotuy the drugs Well this counselor that I was/is kind of ratted me out. She asked me if I was doing drugs and I went off and told my mother how she said it and it a big mess right now and I will be back to tell you the rest.
Lots of love
stay stright unless you cute!!!LOL
hector 
Love ya donna

Well today is sunday as you can see and I am suprisingly doing okay. It has been three whole days and maybe four tomorrow that I have not done the white. Well what shouldI say I have been craving and I have the money and I can get it but I have not wanted to. Well I think I will brake the addiction and that will save me. Well I bettter get going I will talk to you tomorrow.

Well Donna is still mad at me and I can understand. Well She won't look my way and I try so hard. Well i cried so hard to day and I prayed for the first time in like six or seven years. I prayed for the strenght to get over my problems. I don't know what  to do everyone expects me to be the goody two shoes the kiss up, so how can I just go to my mom or someone and say I need help. how can i do it? It seems so unreal to me, I just can't seem to control my toughts anymore the other day because I am so hooked on this Fucken Drug I did it in class. I didn't get cought but what if I would have. i don't know what to do anymore.I know Donna is going to be even more mad at me and I am sorry. I want to stop and I just can't anymore I am just stuck in the spider web and no one is able to cut me out because I am not making any noise. Well I don't know what to do I am thinking about calling my counselor but I hate going to the counselor he just stares at me. I know it is just the pychology thing but I want some one that is going to ask questions and listen to me. I need some one that understands were I am coming from because these counslors don't truly know they hear stories but they never have lived it. Well I am thinking about telling my mom that I need help and going and getting help but I am still unsure how to tell her. This is worse then when I told her that I am gay. I don't know how she is goign to respond because of what it is. Well I guess I need to stop whining and suck it up talk to you later.

Will see what happens.
Lots of love
Stay strong and I will Try
I LOVE YOU DONNA!!!!!!
tHANK YOU FOR BEING YOU!!

Well It is lunch time right now and I am about to get yacked out! but I don't know if I should. Well My friend Donna is mad at me for doing this shit and she won't talk to me and I really like talking to her she is like my only real friend and I don't know what to tell her. I know she will read this and I just want to thank you for everything you have been there through hard times and a good times. and i would wish she will help me out now. I don't know what to do lots of love and talk to you later.

Take that Blue Devil in Fat ass Lines!!!!!!!
Lots of love to those who care about we!!!!
Hector Tovar

Well It has been a long time sense i have talked I guess I am still unsure if I want everyone to know my life. It seems wierd to me but I have so much to say and I don't know were to turn and maybe someone will be able to help. I have been doing crack and my life is going down the drain and i don't know what to do. i spend so much money on it and I don't care about school. I know I need to stop but it is not a easy to stop like that. I would turn to my mother but she has so many of her own problem that I don't want to add more but I don't want to get worse. my mother is fighting with my stepdad all the time and his brother and sister is living in there house that i don't even live in but that is not the point my mother is hurting and I cann't stop it because I can't stop my own pains. i don't want to just go up to someone and say Ineed help but don't tell my mother because i know that would never happen. well I am all yacked out and can't concentrate but this is the only time I feel normal.
Lots of Love 
Help me Out!!
and you will get it back some how.

Well the world is still turnig and I still ain't moving. So this day has got a little better even though I saw the confused little fag (even though I was the one looking for him.) but he cann't even look me in the eye. I so fucken hate him what the heck. Well Even though this is my second update that I turely wrote I don't know what to tell you I really don't want to go into my past because it's so fucked up. Well I guess I could tell you that I have been through alot even though I am only 16. I could tell you how I live with my grandparents because my mother and stepfathers a BITCH. Well I could tell you so much tommorrow is a pep assembly were I can show My creavtive side. My goal is to get most spirited my senior year. I have my whole future set in my school. I fill that if I live through the next five years of school including college I will be someone other than the most spirited or the loser or the fag, I will be the person that everyone wants to be(hahaha) like that would ever happen. Well I hope you got what you need out of me like everyone else.

Let you listen to my whining next time.

Stay up it will help you in your sex life.

Later, Lots of Love

Hector AkA Pinky_2007

Well my friend set this up yesterday or the day before. well after that day I had the worst day ever so I guess i better start whining. Well I have been with this guy and we had done some stuff. Well after a while he stopped coming over so I tryed to communicate to him by letters. so after I don't know how many letter he tells me "I ain't like that no more." What is that? I am gay no i slept on it I am not like that no more. well I hate being stepped on all my life by my mother my father that doesn't take responsiblity for me. I have always been pushed to the side. Well any ways back to my story. He come up to me telling after I wrote to him telling how he had my heart and how I wanted to be his support system. well I better get going. 

Lots of love

Stay up
When the world keeps turning
and you ain't moving

Hector
Aka
Pinky_2007
